column4: Hello. I'm in need of some help with running Ubuntu off of the CD. I tested it and it worked fine on my computer but then tried on my friends computer. It takes forever to start up and then we get a message that says "There was an error starting the GNOME Settings Daemon". This is on a lower end computer and we didn't have the DSL box hooked up. Any help would be appreciated, thanks. (Also I...
you need at minimum 256MB for LiveCD
have you tried the alternate install?
not with that little RAM no
